issue.title: [Developer] Relax clang-tidy check
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7523](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7523). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a very invasive check added in recent clang-tidy.
